events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but it does not fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a refund.
The reported issue has been identified as a Refund request because the customer wants their money back for a product return.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's return request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and request a refund. I'll be happy to assist.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and with tags? This helps us process the refund efficiently.
Sure, my order number is 4523897, and yes, the jacket is brand new and still has all the tags attached.
Thank you for the information. You can send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email shortly. Once received, we will process your refund immediately.
That sounds perfect, thanks for the quick response. I look forward to receiving the label so I can return the jacket without any issues.
The return procedure has been initiated and the prepaid label has been sent to your email. Your refund will be processed as soon as we receive the returned item.
Just following up to confirm that you have returned the jacket, and am pleased to inform you that the refund has been successfully processed.
Thank you for your cooperation. We have closed your return case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
